name: Planet 2117
description:
In far 2078 the era of colonization of other planets has begun. Little module drone R94, managed by pilot from intelligence ship, unsuccessfully landed on planet named 2117. And from that moment the hard path has begun. R94 need to find all modules to find a console and leave the planet. Every module is responsible for its function and without each you can't go on.

Game features:

  • evolving gameplay
  • hardcore in the best traditions of the genre
  • smooth animation and graphics
  • well-conceived level design
  • two endings
